author: leolara
content: Thank you for this, I appreciate it. I have been working on tests for process_withdrawals, process_deposit_request and process proposer slashings. But it would be really great if STEEL and me in particular get more feedback from the clients implementors about which tests are more important and urgent. Also, there is the STEEL discord where you can tell us. I will be basing priorities based on that ðŸ™‚
